name: Old Interactive Resume (2018)
description: The last previous iteration of my portfolio website. Kinda similar to this one.

name: Data Cards
description: Application UI proof of concept using cards to display data, pictures, and a button. Has simple search functionality. Made with Angular, and I also have a version made with React on my Github: https://github.com/josh-mallett/Data-Cards-React

name: NICU Moms of Louisiana
description: Website I made and currently maintain for the NICU Moms of Louisiana non-profit organization. This was made with React, Redux Forms, Sass, and PHP.

name: The Twilight Ride Website
description: A website / logo design I made for a local start up podcast a little while back, that unfortunately never got to take off for reasons unknown to me. Made with Angular 1 and Sass.

name: Old Interactive Resume (2015)
description: A previous iteration of a web based resume I used. I went a bit wacky with the animations on this one. Made with JQuery and Sass.

name: Rectangle Menu
description: Fun little UI proof-of-concept of a rectangle-menu with icon options that expand out on hover. Made with Jquery and Sass.

name: Windows Forms Calculator UI
description: Basic desktop calculator UI made with windows forms C#.
